javacsw.services.pkg

Interface ILocationSubscriberClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiagPublisher, TromboneEventSubscriber, TrombonePublisher

    public interface ILocationSubscriberClient
extends akka.actor.Actor
    LocationSubscriberClient can be used to receive updates to Locations. The message received is a LocationService.Location, which can be a ResolvedAkkLocation, ResolvedHttpLocation, or a ResolvedServiceLocation Note: Implementers of this interface should call: subscribeToLocationUpdates(); to Indicate that they want location updates (Done automatically in Scala version).

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface akka.actor.Actor

        akka.actor.Actor.emptyBehavior$, akka.actor.Actor.ignoringBehavior$

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default scala.PartialFunction<java.lang.Object,scala.runtime.BoxedUnit> locationSubscriberReceive()
      An Akka receive partial function that can be used rather than receiving the Location message in your own code.
      default void locationUpdate(LocationService.Location location)
      If calling the TrackerSubscriberClient recieve, then override this method to handle Location events.
      default void subscribeToLocationUpdates()
      Start receiving location updates.
      default void unsubscribeLocationUpdates()
      The given actor stops listening to Location updates.

    • Method Detail

      • locationSubscriberReceive

        default scala.PartialFunction<java.lang.Object,scala.runtime.BoxedUnit> locationSubscriberReceive()
        An Akka receive partial function that can be used rather than receiving the Location message in your own code.
        Returns:
        Receive partial function

      • subscribeToLocationUpdates

        default void subscribeToLocationUpdates()
        Start receiving location updates. It is necessary to call this in the client when you are ready to receive updates.

      • unsubscribeLocationUpdates

        default void unsubscribeLocationUpdates()
        The given actor stops listening to Location updates.

      • locationUpdate

        default void locationUpdate(LocationService.Location location)
        If calling the TrackerSubscriberClient recieve, then override this method to handle Location events.
        Parameters:
        location - a resolved Location; either HTTP or Akka
